# mutability

**Instance Property**

A mutability option that determines whether you can update a buffer’s contents before related commands use the buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var mutability: MTLMutability { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLMutability/default].

If you don’t explicitly declare mutability, Metal uses the following default behaviors:

- Regular buffers are mutable by default, and Metal treats [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLMutability/default] as if it were [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLMutability/mutable].
- Argument buffers are immutable by default, and Metal treats [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLMutability/default] as if it were [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLMutability/immutable].

## Setting buffer mutability

- **MTLMutability**: The options that determine the mutability of a buffer’s contents.
